K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:324b-1: a'arya pra t'i tya sa mutp'a da hri da ya n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:324b-3: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:324b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:324b-5: chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:324b-6: rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:324b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:325a-0: dge sbyong chen po 'di skad gsungs @325a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:325a-1: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dat /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:325a-2: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:325a-3: snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro; ;mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing zlog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:325a-4: dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:325a-7: mchod pa gang la dmigs te brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:325a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam phul bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-045:325a-9: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying bo rdzogs so ////
